Text:
Second DVD is missing. Metallica - Orgullo, Pasion, y Gloria contains two DVD's. This is just first of them.

hold ur horses doob its comin. and its not the 2nd dvd its a bonus dvd.
This is not the full pack, it lacks the second DVD, whish is NOT a "bonus", it is part of the concert as do.ob said; it lacks also the 2 audio cd's.

the 2nd dvd does have concert footage but it COMES WITH the 1st. u cant buy it separately its only available in the 2cds & 2dvds edition but u CAN get just the 1st alone as it is the "basic" dvd. the 2nd is dubbed bonus in the dvd menu as well. if u want the cds go get them somewhere else this is a torrent for the dvd i never said its the full package learn to read.
download, enjoy & quit bitchin!
